bwwExcerpt: The show features one hilarious one-liner after another ("Fun fact for today...I am on competing medications," George informs us, in an example of the non sequitur style), gleefully taking potshots at such theatrical devices as the overly expository "one-sided phone call." You'll have to be on your toes to catch the spoofing of Billy Crystal's 700 Sundays, Jeremy Piven's mercury poisoning, and Griffin Dunne's geographical qualification for being a "New York actor."
